meanings.sent1: She was the guttiest person in the room, facing her fears head-on.
meanings.sent2: The firefighter's guttiest act was running into the burning building to save the family.
meanings.sent3: Despite her small size, she proved to be the guttiest warrior in the battle.
meanings.sent4: His guttiest decision was to quit his stable job and pursue his passion for painting.
meanings.sent5: The guttiest moment of the movie was when the main character stood up to the bully.

meanings.definition: Having the most courage or determination among a group
meanings.sent1: Among all the contestants, she was the guttiest and never backed down.
meanings.sent2: In the face of danger, the guttiest soldier led the troops with unwavering bravery.
meanings.sent3: The guttiest squirrel in the park fearlessly approached the picnic to steal a snack.
meanings.sent4: His guttiest move in the game secured victory for his team against all odds.
meanings.sent5: The guttiest student in the class always volunteered to speak up for what was right.
